content:
Junior center Vionise PierreLouis goes up for two while under pressure from West Virginia March  for their first game in the Big  Championships at the Chesapeake Energy Arena PERIOD

Oklahoma won its exhibition opener against Central Oklahoma 8664Saturday behind stellar play from the Sooner freshmen PERIOD

Freshman Ana Llanusa led all scorers with  points on 9of21 in her OU debut PERIOD

Freshman forward Mandy Simpson dominated the glass tallying  rebounds on the night to lead all rebounders PERIOD

Llanusa and Simpson saw big minutes in their first collegiate game totaling  and  respectively for a team with only nine active players PERIOD

Oklahoma also benefitted from a hot shooting night by senior guard Gabbi Ortiz who shot 6of13 from deep and finished with  points PERIOD

Senior Vionise PierreLouis anchored the Sooner defense racking up six blocks and nine rebounds PERIOD She and the rest of the defense proved fierce against the Bronchos who shot . from the field as a team PERIOD

The Sooners will face Southwest Oklahoma State in their second and final exhibition game on Tuesday Nov PERIOD  PERIOD Tipoff is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD CT PERIOD
